issue.title: [R] Error when losing data on int64, uint64 conversions to double
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3553](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3553). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Conversions outside the representable range should probably warn or error. See such check we do in Python https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/cpp/src/arrow/python/helpers.cc#L350

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3553?focusedCommentId=16661961) by Romain Francois (romainfrancois):*
This is no longer a problem as we use bit64::integer64
